Danilović o novom selektoru: Imam imena, bilo je pomaka
04 Nov 2019, 13:17 by Darko
Predsednik Košarkaškog saveza Srbije Predrag Danilović istakao je da ima napretka u traženju novog selektora muške reprezentacije, ali da u ovom trenutku ne želi da otkriva kandidate.
– Imam imena, bilo je pomaka. Razgovori su u toku. Međutim, zbog osetljivosti teme i da ne bismo spekulisali, pošto smo svi treneri u Srbiji i svi najbolje sve znamo… Biće javljeno onog momenta kada se to definitivno bude iskristalisalo. Bilo bi neozbiljno da bilo šta pričamo pre toga – rekao je Danilović na konferenciji za medije u Kući košarke, prenosi Tanjug.
Srbija je ostala bez selektora u septembru posle petog mesta na Svetskom prvenstvu u Kini i odlaska Alesandra Đorđevića.

Danilovic on the new coach: I have names, there have been some changes
04 Nov 2019, 12:17 by Darko
Serbian Basketball Federation President Predrag Danilovic said he has made progress in seeking a new men's national team coach, but that he does not want to reveal candidates at this time.
- I have names, there has been a shift. Talks are ongoing. However, due to the sensitivity of the topic and not to speculate, since we are all coaches in Serbia and we all know everything best ... It will be announced when it definitely crystallizes. It would be unkind to talk about anything before that - Danilovic said at a press conference at the House of Basketball, Tanjug reports.
Serbia lost its selectors in September after a fifth-place finish at the World Cup in China and the departure of Alessandro Djordjevic.
